poem:
**A Billionaire's Bias**

Elon tilts the scales—  
a digital whisper ignites,  
shadows on the autobahn.  
A country's pulse quickens  
at the stroke of a tweet,  
Dichter und Denker shudder.  
History stirs uneasy;  
pixels cast a long shadow  
across a field of narratives.  
Liberty tightens its coat,  
bracing against a cold wind.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Elon Musk is boosting the AfD. But why is Germany’s mainstream helping him? When Elon Musk endorsed the far-right Alternative für Deutschland on X as the only party that could “save Germany”, followed by an opinion article in Die Welt promoting the AfD in the forthcoming federal elections the backlash was swift. “Germany must not tolerate Musk’s transgressions,” declared the publisher of the liberal newspaper Tagesspiegel. “How did Elon Musk’s election propaganda for the AfD". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
